mapper.insert: insert into tb_work_plan ( contract_name, plan_type, plan_key, plan_writer, plan_name, write_day, s_day, e_day, req_dept, per_dept, supervisor_id, worker_id, supervisor_name, worker_name, plan_contents, plan_note, app_turn, app_id, app_name, app_total, app_status )values( #{contract_name}, #{plan_type}, #{plan_key}, #{plan_writer}, #{plan_name}, now(), #{s_day}, #{e_day}, #{req_dept}, #{per_dept}, #{supervisor_id}, #{worker_id}, #{supervisor_name}, #{worker_name}, #{plan_contents}, #{plan_note}, 0, #{app_id}, #{app_name}, #{app_total}, 'S' )
mapper.update: update tb_work_plan set plan_name=#{plan_name}, plan_contents=#{plan_contents}, plan_note=#{plan_note}, app_status=#{app_status}, app_turn=app_turn+1, app_time=#{app_time} where idx=#{idx}
